沒.definition: drowned; to end; to die; to inundate

沒sei了.definition: variant of 沒誰了|没谁了[mei2 sei2 le5]

沒上沒下.definition: no respect for seniors; lacking in manners

沒了.definition: to be dead; not to be, or cease to exist

沒事.definition: it's not important; it's nothing; never mind; to have nothing to do; to be free; to be all right (out of danger or trouble)

沒事兒.definition: to have spare time; free from work; it's not important; it's nothing; never mind

沒人味.definition: to be lacking in human character

沒人味兒.definition: erhua variant of 沒人味|没人味[mei2 ren2 wei4]

沒什麼.definition: it doesn't matter; it's nothing; never mind; think nothing of it; it's my pleasure; you're welcome

沒來由.definition: without any reason; for no reason

沒六兒.definition: variant of 沒溜兒|没溜儿[mei2 liu4 r5]

沒勁.definition: to have no strength; to feel weak; exhausted; feeling listless; boring; of no interest

沒勁兒.definition: erhua variant of 沒勁|没劲[mei2 jin4]

沒吃沒穿.definition: to be without food or clothing (idiom); to be very poor

沒命.definition: to lose one's life; to die; recklessly; desperately

沒天理.definition: (old) unprincipled; incorrect; (modern) unnatural; against reason; incredible

沒奈何.definition: to have no alternative; to be helpless

沒好氣.definition: to be in a bad mood

沒完沒了.definition: without end; incessantly; on and on

沒影.definition: to vanish; to be nowhere to be found; unfounded (story)

沒戲.definition: (coll.) not a chance; no way; hopeless

沒日沒夜.definition: day and night; regardless of the time of day or night

沒有.definition: haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

沒有不透風的牆.pinyin: mei2 you3 bu4 tou4 feng1 de5 qiang2
沒有不透風的牆.definition: (idiom) no secret can be kept forever

沒有事.definition: not a bit; nothing is up; nothing alarming is happening

沒有什麼.definition: it is nothing; there's nothing ... about it

沒有什麼不可能.pinyin: mei2 you3 shen2 me5 bu4 ke3 neng2
沒有什麼不可能.definition: nothing is impossible; there's nothing impossible about it

沒有勁頭.definition: to have no strength; to feel weak; feeling listless

沒有勁頭兒.definition: erhua variant of 沒有勁頭|没有劲头[mei2 you3 jin4 tou2]

沒有差別.definition: there is no difference; it makes no difference

沒有意義.definition: not to have any meaning; meaningless

沒有法.definition: at a loss; unable to do anything about it; to have no choice

沒有臉皮.definition: ashamed; embarrassed; not having the face (to meet people); not daring (out of shame)

沒有規矩，不成方圓.pinyin: mei2 you3 gui1 ju5 , bu4 cheng2 fang1 yuan2
沒有規矩，不成方圓.definition: without rules, nothing can be done (idiom); one must follow some rules

沒有規矩，何以成方圓.pinyin: mei2 you3 gui1 ju5 , he2 yi3 cheng2 fang1 yuan2
沒有規矩，何以成方圓.definition: without rules, how can anything be done (idiom); one must follow some rules

沒有關係.definition: see 沒關係|没关系[mei2 guan1 xi5]

沒水準.definition: lacking class; boorish; poor quality; substandard

沒沒無聞.definition: variant of 默默無聞|默默无闻[mo4mo4-wu2wen2]

沒治.definition: hopeless; helpless; incurable; fantastic; out of this world

沒法.definition: at a loss; unable to do anything about it; to have no choice

沒法兒.definition: (coll.) can't do anything about it; (coll.) there's no way that ...; it's simply not credible that ...; (coll.) couldn't be (better) (i.e. simply wonderful)

沒準兒.definition: erhua variant of 沒準|没准[mei2 zhun3]

沒的說.definition: see 沒說的|没说的[mei2 shuo1 de5]

沒眼看.definition: (coll.) can't bear to look at it; hideous; appalling

沒種.definition: not to have the guts (to do sth); cowardly

沒精打采.definition: listless; dispirited; washed out; also written 沒精打彩|没精打彩[mei2 jing1 da3 cai3]

沒臉.definition: ashamed; embarrassed; not having the face (to meet people); not daring (out of shame)

沒苦硬吃.definition: (neologism c. 2024) to stubbornly endure hardships that need not be endured; to go out of one's way to make things difficult for oneself

沒說的.definition: nothing to pick on; really good; nothing to discuss; settled matter; no problem

沒誰了.definition: (coll.) nobody can beat that; extraordinary; remarkable

沒譜.definition: to be clueless; to have no plan

沒譜兒.definition: erhua variant of 沒譜|没谱[mei2 pu3]

沒轍.definition: at one's wit's end; unable to find a way out

沒辦法.definition: there is nothing to be done; one can't do anything about it

沒錯.definition: that's right; sure!; rest assured!; that's good; can't go wrong

沒長眼.definition: see 沒長眼睛|没长眼睛[mei2 zhang3 yan3 jing5]

沒長眼睛.definition: (coll.) are you blind or something?; look where you're going

沒頭沒臉.definition: lit. without head, without face (idiom); fig. frenzily; haphazardly

沒頭蒼蠅.definition: see 無頭蒼蠅|无头苍蝇[wu2 tou2 cang1 ying5]

沒齒不忘.definition: lit. will not be forgotten even after one's teeth fall out; to remember as long as one lives; unforgettable (idiom)

沒齒難忘.definition: hard to forget even after one's teeth fall out (idiom); to remember a benefactor as long as one lives; undying gratitude
